Linear Model Regression Learner with Formula

mlr_learners_regr.lm_formula.Rd

Ordinary linear regression with formula. Calls [stats::lm()].

Super classes

mlr3::Learner -> mlr3::LearnerRegr -> LearnerRegrLMFormula
